buttons.name: Define Data Field
buttons.body: The Generic Data Commons define the data in a general way. Please study the dictionary before you start browsing.
buttons.label: Learn more

buttons.name: Explore Data
buttons.body: The Exploration Page gives you insights and a clear overview under selected factors.
buttons.label: Explore data

buttons.name: Access Data
buttons.body: Use our selected tool to filter out the data you need.
buttons.label: Query data

buttons.name: Submit Data
buttons.body: Submit Data based on the dictionary.
buttons.label: Submit data

login.title: DCF Sandbox
login.subTitle: explore, analyze, and share research data
login.text: The Data Common Frameworks (DCF) supports the management, analysis and sharing of many different types of biomedical data for the research community with the goal of accelerating research in the molecular basis for disease and matching targeted therapies that factor in each patient's unique biology.
login.contact: If you have any questions about access or the registration process, please contact
